They Grow Up So Fast

They Grow Up So Fast is the debut single from Portland-based alt-punk outfit combobox.

Artists
  • combobox
Genres
  • Punk
  • Ska
Type single
Published December 17, 2023
Links
  • https://open.spotify.com/album/0vHDjXvpQQnuwYteRgnfk3?si=w9tsDZHiTMqRCc03YuavtA

A short, hard ska track - and a definitive combobox song. Recorded in the band member's various basements, the recording is less polished than their future singles would prove to be.
